trends: There have been no other sightings in Saint-Jean-sur-Richelieu
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt dawn seen a object on the left side of the moon, for what i know there's no sattelite around the moon at this time.It appears way before the stars start coming out,it stayed stationnary there all thru the evening.When i went to bed around 2 o'clock,it had move on top of the moon.I chek last night on the 28 dec it was no longer there.Weird is in it.Some other people saw it to at the gaz station about half a dozen.But if you got any explanation to give us please do so because anybody who look at the moon that night saw it to.There's only two things i can't think of,a unknown sattelite or a UFO.Just got a image from the space station a UFO BEEN SEEN ON THE 25 DECEMBRE.I think it could be what the talking about.
